title: I Can't Complete a game!

replies.body:
Overlays include:

* Steam

* Discord

* Windows game bar

* Any sort of FPS monitor

Chances are you do have one running, and they fuck up all sorts of stuff, not just LoL.

Well, I've checked those first three and I'm almost certain they're disabled. I do play on a large TV, so that may be the problem. I'll try my normal monitor and see if that works later on, thanks for the advice!
Monitor has nothing to do with it, unless it has weird local software.

download and run the hextech repair tool and send those logs along in a  support ticket to Riot and they will clear up the problem.

at least I'm hoping that will be of some use.
